General.Name: Guizhou Sanli Pharmaceutical Co Ltd
General.Description: GuiZhou SanLi Pharmaceutical Co.,LTD. engages in the research and development, production, and marketing of pharmaceutical products. It offers pediatric medication, respiratory system medication, cardiovascular drugs, injury by fall medication, rehabilitation medicine, GI medicine, and ophthalmic medicine. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Anshun, China.
